1.0.name: wordpress/next-saturday
1.0.description: Add a touch of childlike innocence to your blog with Next Saturday, a bold and playful theme. Originally designed by Ian Mintz, Next Saturday features styling for muliple post formats, custom background and header support, and a right sidebar.
